channel.title: Google adsense?
channel.description:
i just signed in for google adsense thing so i get paid if i put the advertisemnt on my site. so could anyone please explain how it exactly works? do i get paid per clicks or something? if so then how much do i get paid?
thanks

item.title: Google adsense?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Drunk On Java, post:3, topic:16894”][quote author=Scar link=topic=25289.msg285742#msg285742 date=1159837735]
i just signed in for google adsense thing so i get paid if i put the advertisemnt on my site.
so could anyone please explain how it exactly works?
do i get paid per clicks or something?
if so then how much do i get paid?

thanks

[/quote]
It’s like 4 cents a click or something.[/quote]

They dont tell you.

I’d say on average i get about 25cents per click

Read full topic

item.title: Google adsense?
item.dc:creator: @Scar Scar
item.description:
@Scar wrote:

[quote=“irfan786, post:24, topic:16894”][quote author=Weibs link=topic=25289.msg288846#msg288846 date=1159989414]
No, they could file a lawsuit or pretty much anything they want if they feel your offense was bad enough.
[/quote]
That seems more likely, as it is Google your messing with. I’d suggest Clicksor, they pay pretty good and have statistics :).[/quote]

oh…and does Clicksor detect those illegal programs?

Read full topic

item.title: Google adsense?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

Clicksor+Simmilar Torpark Like Program+Scar Auto Clicker Script=$$$
Thats what I did till my site died, made over $200 this way. Im not sure if its still possible though, this was over a year ago…I used a different program that was somewhat simmilar to Torpark back then if anyone wanted to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Google adsense?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Scar, post:13, topic:16894”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=25289.msg286457#msg286457 date=1159894787]
Knowing google it’s probally detectable.
[/quote]

so what if they detect you?[/quote][quote=“Cheatest, post:5, topic:16894”][quote author=Scar link=topic=25289.msg285753#msg285753 date=1159838148]
thanks for the fast reply’s
lol 4 cents a click.

anyway i heard there’s a program which automatically clicks on the adverts trough different proxy’s or something.is this dettectable??in other words : can google see i’m using a program for clicking the adverts?
[/quote]

Thats against the law.[/quote]

It won’t take long for google to get your adress from your internet provider and contact the authoritys. But in the end, it’s up to google.

Read full topic

item.title: Google adsense?
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:5, topic:16894”][quote author=Scar link=topic=25289.msg285753#msg285753 date=1159838148]
thanks for the fast reply’s
lol 4 cents a click.

anyway i heard there’s a program which automatically clicks on the adverts trough different proxy’s or something.is this dettectable??in other words : can google see i’m using a program for clicking the adverts?
[/quote]

Thats against the law.

But yes you get paid by the click and its not always 4 cents… how ever much the add wants to pay per click thats what you get.[/quote]
When I did it, it was only 5 cents a click.

Read full topic
